Structs/Begriffix/Phase.html#/s:5Games9B.abstract: Players must write words with at least four characters, starting player must write horizontally, and opponent must write vertically

Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.abstract: The type of a word which is a sequence of letters

Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.name: Pattern
Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.abstract: A sequence of optional letters, nil means that any letter can be used there

Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.abstract: How many times the starter and opponent have provided a move

Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.name: starter
Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.abstract: The first player in a turn

Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.name: opponent
Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.abstract: The second player in a turn

Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.name: player
Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.abstract: The player who would be asked for the next move

Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.name: phase
Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.abstract: The current game phase which is derived from turn

Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.name: init(board:starter:opponent:)
Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.abstract: Initialize a new begriffix game with given board and players

Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.name: init(startLetters:starter:opponent:)
Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.abstract: Initialize a new begriffix game with start letters as 2*2 fields board

Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.name: init(startLetters:starter:opponent:)
Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.abstract: Initialize a new begriffix game with start letters as array of four field values

Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.name: init(startLetters:starter:opponent:)
Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.abstract: Initialize a new begriffix game with start letters as 2*2 nested array

Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.name: init(startLetters:starter:opponent:)
Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.abstract: Initialize a new begriffix game with start letters as string with four characters

Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.name: play()
Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.abstract: Play the game and pass notifications if a notify callback is set

Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.name: next()
Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.abstract: Advance the game for one move

Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.name: isValid(_:)

Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.name: find()

Structs/Begriffix.html#/s:5Games9Begriff.abstract: Return the words crossing the given place after inserting a given word
